response.overview: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview, moves to oil-rich California. Using his son to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainview's motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.
response.tagline: There will be greed. There will be vengeance.
response.title: There Will Be Blood

titles.title: ゼア・ウィル・ビー・ブラッド

release_dates.note: Single Disc Release & Two-Disc Special Collector's Edition DVD
Festival Internacional de Cine de Punta del Este
